Simone Subal Gallery
Artists Exhibitions Fairs

Art Basel Miami Beach

Nova Jiang, Baseera Khan, Florian Meisenberg, Brian O'Doherty, Veronika Pausova, Jesse Wine, Mie Yim

November 29 - December 3, 2022

For the 2022 edition of Art Basel Miami Beach, Simone Subal Gallery is excited to present recent works by Nova Jiang, Baseera Khan, Florian Meisenberg, Brian O'Doherty, Veronika Pausova, Jesse Wine, and Mie Yim. This will be the gallery's first presentation of Nova Jiang's work.

Artists Exhibitions Fairs

131 Bowery, 2nd floor New York, NY 10002

917 409 0612

Tuesday – Saturday, and by appointment 12PM – 6PM
